name: King
text: On Play: DON!! -2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

effect.text: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.
